齅齅齅

齅字的基本解释

齅
xiù
古同“嗅”：“气寒鼻莫齅。”

齅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiù］
［《廣韻》許救切，去宥，曉。］
(1)嗅，用鼻子闻。
(2)犹臭。参见“齅香”。

齅字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鼻字部】　齅； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1530第38
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?許救切，同嗅。【說文】以鼻就臭也。【增韻】鼻收氣也。【前漢·敘傳】不齅驕君之耳。【師古註】齅，古嗅字。【論語】三齅而作。亦作嗅。　又作㗜。

齅字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
齅字的起名意思

暂无。

齅
Basic explanation of words
齅
xiù
The ancient same "sniffing": "The nose is cold and irritating."
齅
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiù］
["Guang Yun" Xu Jiuqie, go to You, Xiao. ]
(1) Smell, smell with nose.
(2) Still smelly. See "齅香".
齅
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Nose Department] 　齅; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 1530 Page 38
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Xu Jiu cut and smelled the same. [Said the text] The nose smells too. [Enhance rhyme] The nose also condenses qi. [Previous Han·Xu Biography] The ears of the arrogant king. [Annotation to Teachers] 齅, ancient sniffing words. 【The Analects of Confucius】It is written three times. Also for sniffing.　又作㗜.
齅
